DOC.brief_summary: The study evaluate feasibility NLA tool , combine assessment nutritional physical functional status , provide personalized advice independence mobility elderly .
DOC.detailed_description: - Determining proportion elderly subject , accord NLA result , would qualify personalized program improve nutritional physical status ; - Determining segmentation ( define cut-off criterion ) elderly subject stratify 3 NLA subgroup accord strength endurance performance ( 33 % +/- 10 % target group )
DOC.criteria: 1. age 65 90 year , 2. able walk without walk aid , 3. obtain subject 's write informed consent 4. free cognitive impairment ( 3MSE ) , 1. self report restriction exercise ( physician ) . 2. unable carry performance test questionnaires correctly , 3. self report low upper extremity surgery fracture last 3 month 4. selfreported symptomatic coronary artery disease , myocardial infarction last 6 month 5. self report history neurological disease ( e.g. , Parkinson disease , stroke ) residual impairment 6. uncontrolled hypertension ( > 150/90 mm Hg ) 7. self report congestive heart failure 8. unable communicate English . NonEnglish speaking individual exclude due safety concern able understand test instruction .
